Entries.default: This brazier burns brightly before you, blazing with a heat so intense it threatens to scald you from yards away.
The godlike's horn glows - first purple, then a bright red - before erupting in a shower of sparks that spray the floor around the brazier.
This brazier burns brightly before you, blazing with a heat so intense that even you feel it.
You put a shaking hand into the fire, and immediately recoil in pain. The skin on your blistered extremity twists and bubbles, weeping from open sores.

Your hand shakes, and sweat runs from your brow. 

You cannot bring yourself to put your hand to the flame.
